mapper.select: SELECT dctj.id, dctj.NAME, dctj.created_by, dctj.last_updated_by, dctj.last_update_date, dctj.source_type, dctj.built_in, dctj.creation_date, dctjg.NAME AS group_name, (select count(dcts.id) FROM devops_ci_template_step dcts JOIN devops_ci_template_job_step_rel dctjsr ON dctjsr.ci_template_step_id=dcts.id WHERE dctjsr.ci_template_job_id =dctj.id ) AS step_number FROM devops_ci_template_job dctj JOIN devops_ci_template_job_group dctjg ON dctj.group_id = dctjg.id WHERE (dctj.source_id = 0 OR dctj.source_id = #{sourceId})

SELECT dctj.* FROM devops_ci_template_job dctj WHERE dctj.id IN ( SELECT dctsjr.ci_template_job_id FROM devops_ci_template_stage_job_rel dctsjr WHERE dctsjr.ci_template_stage_id = #{stageId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AND dctj.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
